name: Kibito-Shin
description: It is the fusion between Shin and Kibito.

originPlanet.name: World Core
originPlanet.description: The World Core is the native planet of the entire shinjin species, from which the benevolent Kaio and Kaio-shin arise, as well as the malevolent Makaio, Makaio-shin and Demonic Gods in counterpart.
